name: Ekho
headline: Enabling OEMs, distributors, and dealers to sell more vehicles in theâ¦
description: Using Ekhoâs licensed, white-label integration, our partners unlock market coverage and enable buyers to complete checkout, financing, payment, insurance, and titling & registration in a matter of minutes â all automated and online, without a single visit to the DMV.

founders.name: Christopher Howard, Founder
founders.description: Cofounder at Ekho Dealer. Previously ML at Meta. Stanford computer science bachelors and masters.

founders.name: Rowan Mockler, Founder
founders.description: Cofounder at Ekho Dealer. Previously product at Duolingo. Stanford computer science grad.

#  _Lightning-fast_ online vehicle checkout
Ekho’s conversion-optimized Checkout digitizes every aspect of a vehicle purchase, from financing to titling and registration, enabling leads to convert 100% online. Embed Ekho into your website or send leads a custom purchase link to convert more buyers and cut sale processing costs.
[Book a demo](https://www.ekhodealer.com/</demo>)
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7b0ed618fe79ec6d0061/65ef7b0fd618fe79ec6d0176_Check.svg)
Built for dealers, OEMs, distributors, dealer groups, and vehicle shopping sites
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7b0ed618fe79ec6d0061/65ef7b0fd618fe79ec6d0176_Check.svg)
Automate all per-sale busywork
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7b0ed618fe79ec6d0061/65ef7b0fd618fe79ec6d0176_Check.svg)
White-label and compliant in all 50 states
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7b0ed618fe79ec6d0061/65ef7b0fd618fe79ec6d0176_Check.svg)
Drive incremental sales


![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7b0ed618fe79ec6d0061/66d5cfe99c562faa93dccb21_STARK_HERO_IMAGE%20\(2\).png)
EKHO Platforms
## A platform for every use case
Whether you're a dealer, distributor, OEM, or marketplace, Ekho has a solution for you.
Ekho Dealer
Let your website sell vehicles for you.
Dealership

distributors with dealer networks
ekho Building blocks
## Your sales Operating System
Explore just a few of the building blocks within the Ekho product suite. Dealers, OEMs, distributors, marketplaces, and shopping sites use Ekho's building blocks to supercharge their existing sales channels and open new markets.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7b0ed618fe79ec6d0061/675f173bb49657a34b175d91_RENA_configurator.png)
Ekho Configurator
Ekho Configurator is a powerful, white-label vehicle customization tool that lets buyers personalize their vehicles with ease. It integrates seamlessly with Ekho’s Checkout and Preorder, allowing vehicle sellers to provide an interactive and personalized shopping experience.
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7b0ed618fe79ec6d0061/65ef7b0fd618fe79ec6d0176_Check.svg)
Customizable vehicle options
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7b0ed618fe79ec6d0061/65ef7b0fd618fe79ec6d0176_Check.svg)
Handles complex configurations and conditional logic
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7b0ed618fe79ec6d0061/65ef7b0fd618fe79ec6d0176_Check.svg)
Integrates with Checkout and Preorder
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7b0ed618fe79ec6d0061/65ef7b0fd618fe79ec6d0176_Check.svg)
White-label


Ekho Preorder
Ekho Preorder is a prebuilt, white-label vehicle order form optimized for conversion and tailored to preorder campaigns. Ahead of launching a new model, embed Ekho's Preorder into your website to quickly and compliantly accept deposits that you can convert at a later date once units are ready to ship.
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7b0ed618fe79ec6d0061/65ef7b0fd618fe79ec6d0176_Check.svg)
Compliantly accept deposits in all 50 states
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7b0ed618fe79ec6d0061/65ef7b0fd618fe79ec6d0176_Check.svg)
Understand buyer demand and demographics ahead of production
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7b0ed618fe79ec6d0061/65ef7b0fd618fe79ec6d0176_Check.svg)
Convert to orders with Ekho Checkout at a later date
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7b0ed618fe79ec6d0061/65ef7b0fd618fe79ec6d0176_Check.svg)
White-label and fully customizable


![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7b0ed618fe79ec6d0061/66c76052871013d4061900ad_maeving_preorder_checkout.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7b0ed618fe79ec6d0061/65f59e260a019f1d780531c9_janus_checkout.png)
Ekho Checkout
Ekho Checkout is a prebuilt, white-label vehicle order form optimized for conversion and tailored to vehicle sales. Embed Ekho's Checkout into your website, use our Checkout API, or direct customers to a personalized purchase link to easily and compliantly convert leads. All payment options, fees, upsells, and fulfillment options are configurable.
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7b0ed618fe79ec6d0061/65ef7b0fd618fe79ec6d0176_Check.svg)
Close sales in minutes instead of days
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7b0ed618fe79ec6d0061/65ef7b0fd618fe79ec6d0176_Check.svg)
Compliant in all 50 states
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7b0ed618fe79ec6d0061/65ef7b0fd618fe79ec6d0176_Check.svg)
84 mo financing, pre-qual, and state tax/fee calculation
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7b0ed618fe79ec6d0061/65ef7b0fd618fe79ec6d0176_Check.svg)
White-label and fully customizable
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7b0ed618fe79ec6d0061/65ef7b0fd618fe79ec6d0176_Check.svg)
Writes orders back to your DMS


Ekho Buyer Portal
Ekho Buyer Portal is a prebuilt, white-label interface where vehicle buyers can complete their vehicle purchase in minutes. From financing, through insurance purchase and validation, automated titling & reg., logistics coordination, tax administration, and paperwork, the Buyer Portal automates all per-sale busy work and provides a truly unbeatable customer experience where vehicle buyers can complete all post-checkout tasks within minutes.
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7b0ed618fe79ec6d0061/65ef7b0fd618fe79ec6d0176_Check.svg)
Embedded F&I 
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7b0ed618fe79ec6d0061/65ef7b0fd618fe79ec6d0176_Check.svg)
Automated titling and reg. 
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7b0ed618fe79ec6d0061/65ef7b0fd618fe79ec6d0176_Check.svg)
State-specific paperwork workflows
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7b0ed618fe79ec6d0061/65ef7b0fd618fe79ec6d0176_Check.svg)
Insurance verification and fraud detection


![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7b0ed618fe79ec6d0061/65f5a7c98f12c3ee5c6c380b_ctopped_buyer_portal_mobile.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7b0ed618fe79ec6d0061/65f5abb3d631fa79671502fe_Group%20289092%20\(3\)%201.png)
Ekho Admin Portal
The Ekho Admin Portal is where vehicle sellers get full visibility into their leads and orders. Use the Admin Portal to monitor macro-level sales analytics, view granular details of specific orders, manage and list inventory, create/share/track custom purchase links, create discount campaigns, and understand buyer progress.
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7b0ed618fe79ec6d0061/65ef7b0fd618fe79ec6d0176_Check.svg)
Analytics and order observability
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7b0ed618fe79ec6d0061/65ef7b0fd618fe79ec6d0176_Check.svg)
Control inventory
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7b0ed618fe79ec6d0061/65ef7b0fd618fe79ec6d0176_Check.svg)
Create custom purchase links
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7b0ed618fe79ec6d0061/65ef7b0fd618fe79ec6d0176_Check.svg)
Orchestrate re-engagement campaigns


Ekho Partnerships
Ekho works closely with preferred vehicle shippers, servicing networks, homologation experts, marketing agencies, and web design firms - all of which represent market leaders in their respective fields. Our vehicle seller partners get instant access to these partnerships, helping them deliver more vehicles, expedite their GTM strategies, and increase their sales coverage.
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7b0ed618fe79ec6d0061/65ef7b0fd618fe79ec6d0176_Check.svg)
Service networks
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7b0ed618fe79ec6d0061/65ef7b0fd618fe79ec6d0176_Check.svg)
Vehicle shippers
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7b0ed618fe79ec6d0061/65ef7b0fd618fe79ec6d0176_Check.svg)
Warehousing
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7b0ed618fe79ec6d0061/65ef7b0fd618fe79ec6d0176_Check.svg)
Digital marketing and web design agencies


![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7b0ed618fe79ec6d0061/65f5f5717c10349f2dd6ea27_market_coverage.png)
Shopper Testimonials
## Buyers love checking out with Ekho
Hear what they have to say:
Mike L.
Motocross bike buyer. Mike now works at the manufacturer of his MX bike, and it was his experience with the MX brand and Ekho that motivated him to apply for the role.
"I couldn’t believe how easy it was to buy my MX bike. I completed everything on my phone over a morning coffee, and the bike was delivered in just 4 days. All the paperwork was easily accessible in my portal — truly a seamless experience!"
Jane P.
Motorcycle buyer
"Ekho made buying my new motorcycle way easier than any other vehicle purchase I've ever made. I was able to finance, insure, and register the thing all while sitting on my couch at home...AND I didn't need to do any negotiating - I knew the bike's final price right at checkout. A couple of weeks later and my bike got delivered to me at home. The customer support was great throughout the whole process - thanks Ekho team!"
Jeremy S.
Low-speed vehicle buyer
"Discovering I could complete my purchase from the vehicle brand's website with Ekho was a game-changer. Instead of having to go in person somewhere to place my order, I researched and ordered my vehicle from the same website while sitting at home. With that said, I wanted to pick up the vehicle in person once it was ready, so Ekho connected me to the nearest dealer. This blend of online convenience and local service has completely transformed my view of buying a vehicle."
Marcus M.
Fleet manager
"Purchasing multiple commercial vehicles is usually complex, but Ekho has changed the game. Their platform streamlined the entire process, allowing for easy customization and cutting out the usual back-and-forth of purchase agreements, invoices, etc. The efficiency and clarity Ekho provided drastically reduced the effort required for the transaction - they also handled all of the registration and titling work, which was a big relief. Their support team ensured a smooth experience from purchase to delivery, significantly advancing fleet management efficiency. Ekho has truly revolutionized the way we acquire commercial vehicles."
Oliver F.
Motorcycle buyer
"I've bought a few vehicles in my time, but none of the experiences come close to how easy it was with Ekho. I wasn't even planning on buying yet when I first landed on the bike brand's site, but Ekho's checkout made it seem so easy, so I just figured I might as well! The checkout process was user-friendly, and I loved how I could customize my payment plan to fit my budget. The best part? No pushy salespeople. Just me and my computer. The delivery of my bike was timely, and it arrived in pristine condition. Ekho has set a new standard for vehicle buying."
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7b0ed618fe79ec6d0061/65ef7b0fd618fe79ec6d0199_Arrow%20Icon%20Orange%20Left.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7b0ed618fe79ec6d0061/65ef7b0fd618fe79ec6d019a_Arrow%20Icon%20Orange%20Right.svg)

ekho Building blocks
## Your sales Operating System
Explore just a few of the building blocks within the Ekho product suite. Dealers, OEMs, distributors, marketplaces, and shopping sites use Ekho's building blocks to supercharge their existing sales channels and open new markets.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7b0ed618fe79ec6d0061/675f173bb49657a34b175d91_RENA_configurator.png)
Ekho Configurator
Ekho Configurator is a powerful, white-label vehicle customization tool that lets buyers personalize their vehicles with ease. It integrates seamlessly with Ekho’s Checkout and Preorder, allowing vehicle sellers to provide an interactive and personalized shopping experience.
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7b0ed618fe79ec6d0061/65ef7b0fd618fe79ec6d0176_Check.svg)
Customizable vehicle options
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7b0ed618fe79ec6d0061/65ef7b0fd618fe79ec6d0176_Check.svg)
Handles complex configurations and conditional logic
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7b0ed618fe79ec6d0061/65ef7b0fd618fe79ec6d0176_Check.svg)
Integrates with Checkout and Preorder
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7b0ed618fe79ec6d0061/65ef7b0fd618fe79ec6d0176_Check.svg)
White-label


Ekho Preorder
Ekho Preorder is a prebuilt, white-label vehicle order form optimized for conversion and tailored to preorder campaigns. Ahead of launching a new model, embed Ekho's Preorder into your website to quickly and compliantly accept deposits that you can convert at a later date once units are ready to ship.
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7b0ed618fe79ec6d0061/65ef7b0fd618fe79ec6d0176_Check.svg)
Compliantly accept deposits in all 50 states
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7b0ed618fe79ec6d0061/65ef7b0fd618fe79ec6d0176_Check.svg)
Understand buyer demand and demographics ahead of production
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7b0ed618fe79ec6d0061/65ef7b0fd618fe79ec6d0176_Check.svg)
Convert to orders with Ekho Checkout at a later date
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7b0ed618fe79ec6d0061/65ef7b0fd618fe79ec6d0176_Check.svg)
White-label and fully customizable


![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7b0ed618fe79ec6d0061/66c76052871013d4061900ad_maeving_preorder_checkout.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7b0ed618fe79ec6d0061/65f59e260a019f1d780531c9_janus_checkout.png)
Ekho Checkout
Ekho Checkout is a prebuilt, white-label vehicle order form optimized for conversion and tailored to vehicle sales. Embed Ekho's Checkout into your website, use our Checkout API, or direct customers to a personalized purchase link to easily and compliantly convert leads. All payment options, fees, upsells, and fulfillment options are configurable.
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7b0ed618fe79ec6d0061/65ef7b0fd618fe79ec6d0176_Check.svg)
Close sales in minutes instead of days
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7b0ed618fe79ec6d0061/65ef7b0fd618fe79ec6d0176_Check.svg)
Compliant in all 50 states
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7b0ed618fe79ec6d0061/65ef7b0fd618fe79ec6d0176_Check.svg)
84 mo financing, pre-qual, and state tax/fee calculation
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7b0ed618fe79ec6d0061/65ef7b0fd618fe79ec6d0176_Check.svg)
White-label and fully customizable
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7b0ed618fe79ec6d0061/65ef7b0fd618fe79ec6d0176_Check.svg)
Writes orders back to your DMS


Ekho Buyer Portal
Ekho Buyer Portal is a prebuilt, white-label interface where vehicle buyers can complete their vehicle purchase in minutes. From financing, through insurance purchase and validation, automated titling & reg., logistics coordination, tax administration, and paperwork, the Buyer Portal automates all per-sale busy work and provides a truly unbeatable customer experience where vehicle buyers can complete all post-checkout tasks within minutes.
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7b0ed618fe79ec6d0061/65ef7b0fd618fe79ec6d0176_Check.svg)
Embedded F&I

Ekho Admin Portal
The Ekho Admin Portal is where vehicle sellers get full visibility into their leads and orders. Use the Admin Portal to monitor macro-level sales analytics, view granular details of specific orders, manage and list inventory, create/share/track custom purchase links, create discount campaigns, and understand buyer progress.

Ekho Partnerships
Ekho works closely with preferred vehicle shippers, servicing networks, homologation experts, marketing agencies, and web design firms - all of which represent market leaders in their respective fields. Our vehicle seller partners get instant access to these partnerships, helping them deliver more vehicles, expedite their GTM strategies, and increase their sales coverage.

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7b0ed618fe79ec6d0061/65f5f5717c10349f2dd6ea27_market_coverage.png)
Shopper Testimonials
## Buyers love checking out with Ekho
Hear what they have to say:
Mike L.
Motocross bike buyer. Mike now works at the manufacturer of his MX bike, and it was his experience with the MX brand and Ekho that motivated him to apply for the role.
"I couldn’t believe how easy it was to buy my MX bike. I completed everything on my phone over a morning coffee, and the bike was delivered in just 4 days. All the paperwork was easily accessible in my portal — truly a seamless experience!"
Jane P.
Motorcycle buyer
"Ekho made buying my new motorcycle way easier than any other vehicle purchase I've ever made. I was able to finance, insure, and register the thing all while sitting on my couch at home...AND I didn't need to do any negotiating - I knew the bike's final price right at checkout. A couple of weeks later and my bike got delivered to me at home. The customer support was great throughout the whole process - thanks Ekho team!"
Jeremy S.
Low-speed vehicle buyer
"Discovering I could complete my purchase from the vehicle brand's website with Ekho was a game-changer. Instead of having to go in person somewhere to place my order, I researched and ordered my vehicle from the same website while sitting at home. With that said, I wanted to pick up the vehicle in person once it was ready, so Ekho connected me to the nearest dealer. This blend of online convenience and local service has completely transformed my view of buying a vehicle."
Marcus M.
Fleet manager
"Purchasing multiple commercial vehicles is usually complex, but Ekho has changed the game. Their platform streamlined the entire process, allowing for easy customization and cutting out the usual back-and-forth of purchase agreements, invoices, etc. The efficiency and clarity Ekho provided drastically reduced the effort required for the transaction - they also handled all of the registration and titling work, which was a big relief. Their support team ensured a smooth experience from purchase to delivery, significantly advancing fleet management efficiency. Ekho has truly revolutionized the way we acquire commercial vehicles."
Oliver F.
Motorcycle buyer
"I've bought a few vehicles in my time, but none of the experiences come close to how easy it was with Ekho. I wasn't even planning on buying yet when I first landed on the bike brand's site, but Ekho's checkout made it seem so easy, so I just figured I might as well! The checkout process was user-friendly, and I loved how I could customize my payment plan to fit my budget. The best part? No pushy salespeople. Just me and my computer. The delivery of my bike was timely, and it arrived in pristine condition. Ekho has set a new standard for vehicle buying."
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7b0ed618fe79ec6d0061/65ef7b0fd618fe79ec6d0199_Arrow%20Icon%20Orange%20Left.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7b0ed618fe79ec6d0061/65ef7b0fd618fe79ec6d019a_Arrow%20Icon%20Orange%20Right.svg)

generated_description:
### Ekho: Revolutionizing Vehicle Sales

**Overview**

Ekho, founded in 2022 and part of Y Combinator’s Batch S22, is on a mission to empower OEMs, distributors, and dealers to efficiently sell more vehicles. Based in New York, the company boasts a compact yet agile team of 10.

**What They Do**

Ekho's primary offering is a licensed, white-label integration that transforms the vehicle buying experience. By digitizing the entire process—from checkout to financing, payment, insurance, and even titling and registration—Ekho enables buyers to complete their purchases online without stepping into a DMV. Think of it as Amazon for vehicles, but with all the complexities simplified and automated.

**Key Features**
- **Lightning-Fast Checkout:** Their optimized checkout process allows consumers to close sales in mere minutes.
- **Comprehensive Market Solutions:** Ekho serves a variety of use cases including marketplaces, dealerships, and OEMs—both new entrants and those with existing dealer networks.
- **Customization Tools:** Platforms like **Ekho Configurator** allow buyers to personalize vehicles easily, providing an interactive shopping experience.

**Platforms Offered**
- **Ekho Dealer:** An embedded system that turns any website into a vehicle-selling platform.
- **Ekho Omni:** Creates a direct-to-consumer purchase experience connected to the dealer network.
- **Ekho Access:** Streamlines market entry across all 50 states in a fraction of the time typically required.

**The Team**  
Jared Friedman stands out as their Group Partner, bringing leadership and expertise to drive the company's vision.

**Partnerships and Market Impact**  
Ekho collaborates with various industry leaders including shipping networks and marketing agencies, helping partners deliver vehicles faster and expand their market reach. 

**Testimonials**  
Buyers have shared overwhelmingly positive feedback—one motorbike customer remarked how seamless it was to finalize his purchase from his phone over coffee, and a fleet manager highlighted how Ekho radically reduced complexity in acquiring multiple vehicles.

With Ekho, the vehicle purchase experience is no longer constrained by brick-and-mortar limitations. The innovation lies not just in technology but in the transformation of consumers' experiences—a shift towards a future where buying a vehicle is as easy as buying a book online.

For further details, visit their website: [Ekho Dealer](https://www.ekhodealer.com). 

---

This overview encapsulates how Ekho is set to change the landscape of vehicle sales, making the process smoother, quicker, and significantly more convenient for both buyers and sellers.
